TopicTitle: Custom planet mods.... what's going on?

Articles.Content:
Alright, I've been trying to figure this out on my own but I'm confused..

Custom planet mods, ie Planet Factory, look awesome... but I have no idea what the state of these mods are... They all seem to be dead, which is sad.

Are they all dead? Is there a planet factory strain thats compatible with .25? Anything being worked on? I love the idea but the idea seems to be dead and theres seems to be a curse of these mods work being stopped on...

The Kopernicus mod is in development to replace those old mods and make the whole process a lot smoother and easier. It isn't completely finished yet but its somewhat workable as is, at least for simple stuff.
